Navigator

Class Navigator

  • java.lang.Object
    • Navigator.Navigator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TimerInterface

    public class Navigator
extends java.lang.Object
implements TimerInterface
    A controller allowing the navigation of the robot

      • Navigator

        public Navigator(Odometer odometer,

        autostart - Start polling automatically or not

    • Method Detail

      • followPath

        public static void followPath(Navigator nav,
              java.util.Queue<Vec2D> qw,
              Interrupter ip)
        This static function makes robot to follow the path until an interruption signal is sent
        Parameters:
        nav - Instance of the navigator
        qw - Way-points that the robot to go though. Once a way-point is archived it is removed from the queue
        ip - Interrupter instance that will be externally set to indicate that we should stop following the path

      • goForward

        public void goForward(double distance)
        Go forward a set distance in cm
        Parameters:
        distance - distance to go forward

      • isNavigating

        public boolean isNavigating()
        This method returns true if another thread has called travelTo() or turnTo() and the method has yet to return; false otherwise.
        Returns:
        True if navigation is enable, false otherwise

      • setForwardSpeed

        public void setForwardSpeed(int ForwardSpeed)
        Changes the forward speed used by travelTo method
        Parameters:
        ForwardSpeed - new magnitude for the forward speed

      • setRotationSpeed

        public void setRotationSpeed(int RotationSpeed)
        Changes the rotation speed used by turnTo method
        Parameters:
        RotationSpeed - new magnitude for the rotation speed
